data.message: Thanks for the heads up Facebook....appreciate that I love  Facebook it keeps me in touch with friends an family all over the world.....thnx

replies.message: Sounds like you're enjoying your Facebook experience, Shannon. Hope you have a great day! -Abby

Yes I am very much so....I just wish I could afford to spend Christmas holidays with my only child an my 3 grandson instead of talking to them on here. I got layed off my job 2 wks ago so I can't afford Christmas nor spend it with them so we stay connected threw Facebook it's better than being able to keep n contact during the holidays. Thnx Abby! God bless u all wit Happy an Safe holidays to u an ur family
You lie FB! Half of the posts I type don't show! Where in the world do they end up, in the trash?
Amelia Cortez I'm not fb so can u remove ur comment frm my comments. I don't understand why u commented on my response
Sorry, I was not responding to you at all.
It was Fb's comments about being there for its members; not always true.
